scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const {execSync}=require('child_process');const root=process.cwd();const candidates=[];const isViteProject=(dir)=>{const pj=path.join(dir,'package.json');if(!fs.existsSync(pj))return false;try{const j=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(pj,'utf8'));const deps=Object.assign({},j.dependencies||{},j.devDependencies||{});return Boolean(deps.vite)||(j.scripts&&Object.values(j.scripts).some(s=>String(s).includes('vite')));}catch{return false;}};const walk=(dir,depth)=>{if(depth>4)return;for(const ent of fs.readdirSync(dir,{withFileTypes:true})){if(ent.name==='node_modules'||ent.name.startsWith('.'))continue;const p=path.join(dir,ent.name);if(ent.isDirectory()){if(isViteProject(p))candidates.push(p);walk(p,depth+1);}}};walk(root,0);const target=candidates.sort((a,b)=>a.length-b.length)[0];if(!target)throw new Error('No Vite project folder with package.json found');execSync('npm install --prefix '+JSON.stringify(target)+' --no-audit --no-fund',{stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.dev: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const {spawnSync}=require('child_process');const root=process.cwd();const candidates=[];const isViteProject=(dir)=>{const pj=path.join(dir,'package.json');if(!fs.existsSync(pj))return false;try{const j=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(pj,'utf8'));const deps=Object.assign({},j.dependencies||{},j.devDependencies||{});return Boolean(deps.vite)||(j.scripts&&Object.values(j.scripts).some(s=>String(s).includes('vite')));}catch{return false;}};const walk=(dir,depth)=>{if(depth>4)return;for(const ent of fs.readdirSync(dir,{withFileTypes:true})){if(ent.name==='node_modules'||ent.name.startsWith('.'))continue;const p=path.join(dir,ent.name);if(ent.isDirectory()){if(isViteProject(p))candidates.push(p);walk(p,depth+1);}}};walk(root,0);const target=candidates.sort((a,b)=>a.length-b.length)[0];if(!target)throw new Error('No Vite project folder with package.json found');const r=spawnSync('npm',['--prefix',target,'run','dev'],{stdio:'inherit'});process.exit(r.status??1);"
scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const {spawnSync}=require('child_process');const root=process.cwd();const candidates=[];const isViteProject=(dir)=>{const pj=path.join(dir,'package.json');if(!fs.existsSync(pj))return false;try{const j=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(pj,'utf8'));const deps=Object.assign({},j.dependencies||{},j.devDependencies||{});return Boolean(deps.vite)||(j.scripts&&Object.values(j.scripts).some(s=>String(s).includes('vite')));}catch{return false;}};const walk=(dir,depth)=>{if(depth>4)return;for(const ent of fs.readdirSync(dir,{withFileTypes:true})){if(ent.name==='node_modules'||ent.name.startsWith('.'))continue;const p=path.join(dir,ent.name);if(ent.isDirectory()){if(isViteProject(p))candidates.push(p);walk(p,depth+1);}}};walk(root,0);const target=candidates.sort((a,b)=>a.length-b.length)[0];if(!target)throw new Error('No Vite project folder with package.json found');const r=spawnSync('npm',['--prefix',target,'run','build'],{stdio:'inherit'});process.exit(r.status??1);"
scripts.preview: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const {spawnSync}=require('child_process');const root=process.cwd();const candidates=[];const isViteProject=(dir)=>{const pj=path.join(dir,'package.json');if(!fs.existsSync(pj))return false;try{const j=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(pj,'utf8'));const deps=Object.assign({},j.dependencies||{},j.devDependencies||{});return Boolean(deps.vite)||(j.scripts&&Object.values(j.scripts).some(s=>String(s).includes('vite')));}catch{return false;}};const walk=(dir,depth)=>{if(depth>4)return;for(const ent of fs.readdirSync(dir,{withFileTypes:true})){if(ent.name==='node_modules'||ent.name.startsWith('.'))continue;const p=path.join(dir,ent.name);if(ent.isDirectory()){if(isViteProject(p))candidates.push(p);walk(p,depth+1);}}};walk(root,0);const target=candidates.sort((a,b)=>a.length-b.length)[0];if(!target)throw new Error('No Vite project folder with package.json found');const r=spawnSync('npm',['--prefix',target,'run','preview'],{stdio:'inherit'});process.exit(r.status??1);"
